code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:{'gid':'','user_ids':[],'timestamp':'','name':''}};var gamePreviewSlice=createSlice({name:'previewGame',initialState:initialState,reducers:{changeGame:function changeGame(state,action){state.value=action.payload;}}});var changeGame=gamePreviewSlice.actions.changeGame;export{changeGame};export var selectPreviewGame=function selectPreviewGame(state){return state.previewGame.value;};export default gamePreviewSlice.reducer;
